name: FLyfe
description:
FLyfe is a game where you start your life as a little space fly. You explore the asteroid you were born on and its four bioms. But hurry, not only is the asteroid moving right into a black hole, but also your time is limited.

After a fixed period your fly is going to die, but that's only the beginning of a new fly life, a new FLyfe born. And with each generation you are offered the choice of a new skillset to develop new technologies. 

Choose the right path of skills to reach the technological level to leave the asteroid and save yourself.

For you are many, you are FLyfe.

For the best Experience play version 1.07!

This Game is a Submission for the GameDev.tv Game Jam.

We are a team of four game dev beginners. So please give us feedback on the game how to improve it and report bugs you encounter while playing.

Special Thanks to our friend Alex for the awesome Voiceover and to our friend Kay for the help with testing our game!

Have Fun,

FloPeace, Mochinator, Cordles, Physikar
